hw3

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • hw3.Sprite
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Explosion, MovableSprite

    public abstract class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for simple objects in a video game.

    • Method Summary
